tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE OccupancyPatterns (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    room_number INT,
    occupancy_status BOOL,
    occupancy_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    occupancy_end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyUsage (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    room_number INT,
    energy_consumed FLOAT,
    energy_saving_suggestions TEXT,
    date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    occupancy_id INT,
    energy_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE occupancy (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_name VARCHAR(255),
    occupancy_status BOOLEAN,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE efficiency_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    efficiency_rating FLOAT,
    energy_saved FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE occupancy_patterns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    occupancy_status BOOL,
    occupancy_count INT,
    occupancy_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE occupancy_pattern (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  occupancy_status VARCHAR(10),
  occupancy_count INT,
  time_of_change TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE room_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  light_intensity INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES occupancy_pattern(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  electricity_consumption FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES occupancy_pattern(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE efficiency_metrics (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  efficiency_score FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES occupancy_pattern(room_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_reduction (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  waste_saved FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES occupancy_pattern(room_id)
);
